General.Name: Manolete Partners PLC
General.Description: Manolete Partners Plc operates as an insolvency litigation financing company in the United Kingdom. The company is involved in the acquisition and funding of insolvency litigation cases. Manolete Partners Plc was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 21 Gloucester Place, London, United Kingdom, W1U 8HR
